Question
========

Given two independent stochastic variables x and y with standard deviation 12 and 5, respectively. z = x - y. The s.d. of z is then

Answerlist
----------

* 7
* 10.9
* 13
* 17

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 7: Incorrect
* 10.9: Incorrect
* 13: Correct
* 17: Incorrect
